short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy way to unsubscribe all your Rumble Channels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How it works:
- First, install this extension.
- Next, click on the gray rumble icon next to your URL bar. Don't see the icon? Click on the puzzle piece, and then click on the pin to move it to your URL bar.
- Click on "Unsubscribe!" buton to start the process.
- The extension will navigate to your subs list, click "OK" to the popup message to confirm and start to unsubscribe. (If the popup doesn't show up, please refresh the tab until it does).
- Wait until it finishes.
- If you are using Free Version, when it finishes, just refresh the page to continue.
- If you want to stop the process while it is running, click on the gray rumble icon next to your URL bar, then click on "Stop!" button.

Not working? Comment or email me so that I can address the issue.
